pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Black Sun (2022, web series)$(br2)Used to craft Shadowmoon's $(l:black_sun/devices/century_king_moon_driver)Century King Moon Driver$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Shadowmoon's $(l:black_sun/riders/shadowmoon#shadowmoon)base$(/l) state
Obtained by using $(l:black_sun/items/creation_king_extract_vial)Creation King Extract Vials$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/kaijin_stone_generator)Kaijin Stone Generator$(/l)
